item.description:
What – Singles Dance with DJ, a great sound and light system, food, martinis, wine & optional ice breaking activities.

When - Saturday 20 December 2008.

Where – Holiday Inn - Rockland(formerly the Radisson) - 781-871-0545

Food – the Holiday Inn has graciously agreed to create a special pub style menu for appetizers and light sandwiches. They also will have a martini menu and wine list available for your drinking pleasure.

Cocktails from 700-830
Optional Speed Dating from 730-830. First come first served
As well as Ice breakers for non-speed daters

Dancing with a great DJ, clean sounds system and light show.

DJ – Cash Bar – Full yummy Menu.

$20

$ 15 if you prepay

As Always Dress to Impress - No Jeans & Sneakers Please
this event has been posted in more than one place - please only RSVP in one place
thanks - the mgt

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Single Mingle @ Rockland Holiday Inn (formely the Radisson) 7-12
